source:
Choose your travel dates

Choose your travel dates

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-date-picker`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-date-picker-v0.1.md) is an AMP component which allows to select a single date or a range of dates. Its implementation is based on [react-dates](https://github.com/airbnb/react-dates)
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

amp-date-picker is an AMP component which allows to select a single date or a range of dates. Its implementation is based on react-dates
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction
 [`amp-date-picker`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-date-picker-v0.1.md) is an AMP component which allows to select a single date or a range of dates. Its implementation is based on [react-dates](https://github.com/airbnb/react-dates)

sections.doc_: ## Setup
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Setup

sections.doc_: Include the `amp-date-picker` component.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Include the `amp-date-picker` component.

sections.doc_: Include the `amp-bind` component to set variables based on the selected date.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Include the `amp-bind` component to set variables based on the selected date.

sections.doc_: Include the `amp-mustache` component to display an info panel below the date picker.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Include the `amp-mustache` component to display an info panel below the date picker.

sections.doc_: Include the `amp-lightbox` component to display a date picker inside a fullscreen lightbox view.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Include the `amp-lightbox` component to display a date picker inside a fullscreen lightbox view.

sections.doc_: Include the `amp-form` component for creating forms.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Include the `amp-form` component for creating forms.

sections.code:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-date-picker/index.html">
<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
<script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>

sections.doc_: In order to personalize `amp-date-picker` style, you can use classes such as `CalendarMonth_caption` which are inherited from [react-dates](https://github.com/airbnb/react-dates). `amp-date-picker` also exposes CSS classes which you can use in CSS rule, like `amp-date-picker-selecting`, which is applied to the date input the user is editing.
sections.normalizedDoc_: In order to personalize `amp-date-picker` style, you can use classes such as `CalendarMonth_caption` which are inherited from [react-dates](https://github.com/airbnb/react-dates). `amp-date-picker` also exposes CSS classes which you can use in CSS rule, like `amp-date-picker-selecting`, which is applied to the date input the user is editing.

sections.doc_: ## Single date picker
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Single date picker

sections.doc_:
`amp-date-picker` with `type=single` can be used for selecting a single date.
You can use `amp-mustache` with `info-template` attribute to show an info-panel below the calendar, here we are showing the date that you just selected. `info-template` also enables AMP binding making available variables which have been set with `AMP.setState`.
A placeholder is required for the component. For a single date, this can take the form:
`<input amp-date-placeholder placeholder="Pick a date">`. `amp-date-picker` introduces the `clear` and `today` actions. `clear` can be called after clicking on a button to clear the date selection. The `today` action allows users to quickly select the current date, and its `offset` argument chooses how many days from today to set the date.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
`amp-date-picker` with `type=single` can be used for selecting a single date.
You can use `amp-mustache` with `info-template` attribute to show an info-panel below the calendar, here we are showing the date that you just selected. `info-template` also enables AMP binding making available variables which have been set with `AMP.setState`.
A placeholder is required for the component. For a single date, this can take the form:
`<input amp-date-placeholder placeholder="Pick a date">`. `amp-date-picker` introduces the `clear` and `today` actions. `clear` can be called after clicking on a button to clear the date selection. The `today` action allows users to quickly select the current date, and its `offset` argument chooses how many days from today to set the date.

sections.doc_: ## Custom date markup
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Custom date markup

sections.doc_: In addition, you can also use `amp-mustache` to create templates for custom date markup, such as an icon instead of the number of the month. Here we are using a taco icon in place of the number of the month with a frequency of 2 weeks every Tuesday. Common use cases could be dates of the month where the price of an item is fixed to a specific number.
sections.normalizedDoc_: In addition, you can also use `amp-mustache` to create templates for custom date markup, such as an icon instead of the number of the month. Here we are using a taco icon in place of the number of the month with a frequency of 2 weeks every Tuesday. Common use cases could be dates of the month where the price of an item is fixed to a specific number.

sections.doc_: ## Date Range Picker
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Date Range Picker

sections.doc_:
`amp-date-picker` with `type=range` can be used for selecting a date range.
By default, `amp-date-picker` disables past dates, use `min` attribute to enable them.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
`amp-date-picker` with `type=range` can be used for selecting a date range.
By default, `amp-date-picker` disables past dates, use `min` attribute to enable them.

sections.doc_: ## External Configuration
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## External Configuration

sections.doc_: ## Static date picker
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Static date picker

sections.doc_: `amp-date-picker` with mode="static" can display a calendar view. The static picker can be used with or without an attached input.
sections.code:
<amp-date-picker id="static-picker"
  type="single"
  mode="static"
  layout="fixed-height"
  height="360"
  format="YYYY-MM-DD"
  input-selector="#static-picker-input">
</amp-date-picker>
sections.preview:
<amp-date-picker id="static-picker"
    type="single"
    mode="static"
    layout="fixed-height"
    height="360"
    format="YYYY-MM-DD"
    input-selector="#static-picker-input">
  </amp-date-picker>
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-date-picker` with mode="static" can display a calendar view. The static picker can be used with or without an attached input.

sections.doc_: ## Highlighted and blocked attributes
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Highlighted and blocked attributes

sections.doc_:
`amp-date-picker` supports a range of attributes, for example `highlighted` and `blocked`. Find the complete list in the official [doc](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/tree/master/extensions/amp-date-picker/0.1).
The `blocked` attribute allows to specify a space separated list of ISO 8601 dates and RFC 5545 RRULEs specifying disallowed dates.
The `highlighted` attributes a space separated list of ISO 8601 dates and RFC 5545 RRULEs specifying dates displayed with a highlight style.
Here every Thursday is `highlighted`, while every weekend is `blocked`.
sections.code:
<amp-date-picker id="simple-date-picker-3"
  type="single"
  mode="static"
  layout="fixed-height"
  height="360"
  on="select:AMP.setState({date3: event.date ? event.date : ''})"
  locale="en"
  format="YYYY-MM-DD"
  highlighted="FREQ=WEEKLY;WKST=SU;BYDAY=TH"
  blocked="FREQ=WEEKLY;WKST=SU;BYDAY=SA,SU">
</amp-date-picker>
sections.preview:
<amp-date-picker id="simple-date-picker-3"
    type="single"
    mode="static"
    layout="fixed-height"
    height="360"
    on="select:AMP.setState({date3: event.date ? event.date : ''})"
    locale="en"
    format="YYYY-MM-DD"
    highlighted="FREQ=WEEKLY;WKST=SU;BYDAY=TH"
    blocked="FREQ=WEEKLY;WKST=SU;BYDAY=SA,SU">
  </amp-date-picker>
sections.normalizedDoc_:
`amp-date-picker` supports a range of attributes, for example `highlighted` and `blocked`. Find the complete list in the official [doc](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/tree/master/extensions/amp-date-picker/0.1).
The `blocked` attribute allows to specify a space separated list of ISO 8601 dates and RFC 5545 RRULEs specifying disallowed dates.
The `highlighted` attributes a space separated list of ISO 8601 dates and RFC 5545 RRULEs specifying dates displayed with a highlight style.
Here every Thursday is `highlighted`, while every weekend is `blocked`.

sections.doc_: ## Allow-blocked-dates attribute
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Allow-blocked-dates attribute

sections.doc_: If the date picker uses `type="range"` and there are blocked dates that are allowed to be part of the range, the `allow-blocked-dates` attribute allows users to select ranges that include blocked dates.
sections.code:
<amp-date-picker id="simple-date-picker-4"
  type="range"
  mode="static"
  layout="fixed-height"
  height="360"
  on="select:AMP.setState({date4: event.date ? event.date : ''})"
  locale="en"
  format="YYYY-MM-DD"
  allow-blocked-ranges
  highlighted="FREQ=WEEKLY;WKST=SU;BYDAY=TH"
  blocked="FREQ=WEEKLY;WKST=SU;BYDAY=SA,SU">
</amp-date-picker>
sections.preview:
<amp-date-picker id="simple-date-picker-4"
    type="range"
    mode="static"
    layout="fixed-height"
    height="360"
    on="select:AMP.setState({date4: event.date ? event.date : ''})"
    locale="en"
    format="YYYY-MM-DD"
    allow-blocked-ranges
    highlighted="FREQ=WEEKLY;WKST=SU;BYDAY=TH"
    blocked="FREQ=WEEKLY;WKST=SU;BYDAY=SA,SU">
  </amp-date-picker>
sections.normalizedDoc_: If the date picker uses `type="range"` and there are blocked dates that are allowed to be part of the range, the `allow-blocked-dates` attribute allows users to select ranges that include blocked dates.

sections.doc_: ## Lightbox date picker
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Lightbox date picker

sections.doc_: `amp-date-picker` can display inside a modal lightbox. The `activate` event opens the lightbox if the user focuses the picker's connected input elements and presses the down arrow key. `deactivate` is triggered when the user presses escape when interacting with the calendar view. For a touch-only interface box, the `on="tap:..."` attribute opens the picker when the user taps on the input.
sections.code: Choose your travel dates
sections.preview: Choose your travel dates
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-date-picker` can display inside a modal lightbox. The `activate` event opens the lightbox if the user focuses the picker's connected input elements and presses the down arrow key. `deactivate` is triggered when the user presses escape when interacting with the calendar view. For a touch-only interface box, the `on="tap:..."` attribute opens the picker when the user taps on the input.

sections.doc_: ## Fullscreen lightbox date picker
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Fullscreen lightbox date picker

sections.doc_: `amp-date-picker` can also display as a fullscreen view inside a lightbox. The `fullscreen` attribute tells the date picker to take up the space in its container and allow its content to scroll vertically.
sections.code: Choose your travel dates
sections.preview: Choose your travel dates
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-date-picker` can also display as a fullscreen view inside a lightbox. The `fullscreen` attribute tells the date picker to take up the space in its container and allow its content to scroll vertically.

sections.doc_: ## Date picker in a form
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Date picker in a form

sections.doc_: `amp-date-picker` integrates with AMP forms. If you don't provide an input for a static picker, it will create a hidden input to submit in the form.
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-date-picker` integrates with AMP forms. If you don't provide an input for a static picker, it will create a hidden input to submit in the form.

sections.doc_: ## Date picker with amp-bind
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Date picker with amp-bind

sections.doc_: `amp-date-picker` integrates with `amp-bind`. The `min` and `max` attributes can be used to update the min and max date.
sections.code:
<amp-state id="binding">
  <script type="application/json">
    {
      "min": "",
      "max": ""
    }
  </script>
</amp-state>
<input on="change:AMP.setState({binding: {min: event.value}})"
  placeholder="Minimum date">
<input on="change:AMP.setState({binding: {max: event.value}})"
  placeholder="Maximum date">
<amp-date-picker id="bind-picker"
  type="single"
  mode="static"
  layout="fixed-height"
  height="360"
  format="MM/DD/YYYY"
  [min]="binding.min"
  [max]="binding.max">
</amp-date-picker>
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-date-picker` integrates with `amp-bind`. The `min` and `max` attributes can be used to update the min and max date.

<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>amp-date-picker</title>
  <script async custom-element="amp-date-picker" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-date-picker-0.1.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-bind" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-bind-0.1.js"></script>
  <script async custom-template="amp-mustache" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-mustache-0.2.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-lightbox" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-lightbox-0.1.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-form" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-form-0.1.js"></script>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-date-picker/index.html">
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
